hypothesis_content.title: Wall Street Forecast Revision Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When a major Wall Street bank (Goldman, JPM, Citi) publicly revises its BTC price forecast by >15% during NEUTRAL regime, BTC will trend in the revision direction over the next 3 trading days as institutional flows realign.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes with lack of clear direction, authoritative external narratives from major banks can catalyze institutional allocation decisions. The 'Wall Street Trims Forecasts' news item suggests this catalyst is currently in play. The effect is slower and more sustained than a CPI print.
entry_conditions: Major bank BTC price forecast revision news headline appears
Current regime is NEUTRAL (per FjordHQ regime detector)
Enter on next daily candle open after news confirmation

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3 trading days after entry OR a 7% move in revision direction
exit_conditions.time_exit: Close of 3rd trading day after entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Average 3-day return following >15% forecast revision is not statistically different from average 3-day return in neutral regime without such news.
